title: Bami Goreng
instructions: Cook egg noodles according to package instructions, drain and set aside.
Heat oil in a wok or large pan over high heat. Add the planted and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until golden.
Add sliced garlic, ginger, and vegetables. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until slightly tender.
Add the cooked noodles to the wok along with kecap manis (sweet soy sauce), soy sauce, and a pinch of white pepper.
Toss everything together over high heat for 2 minutes until well combined and heated through.
Serve immediately, garnished with sliced spring onions, fried shallots, and a wedge of lime.
